Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Miniature vase with an extremely bulging body. It has a short straight foot, a flat circular bottom, a globular body and a high shoulder. The small short neck ends in a very wide bevelled lip. The opening of the vessel is very small. There are wo incisions at the base of the neck.
